definitions.definition: An adverse judgment or opinion formed beforehand or without knowledge of the facts.
A preconception , any preconceived opinion or feeling , whether positive or negative.
An irrational hostile attitude, fear or hatred towards a particular group , race or religion .
examples: I am free of all prejudices . I hate everyone equally.

definitions.definition: Knowledge formed in advance; foresight , presaging .

main_definition: ( countable ) An adverse judgment or opinion formed beforehand or without knowledge of the facts.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A preconception , any preconceived opinion or feeling , whether positive or negative.
( countable ) An irrational hostile attitude, fear or hatred towards a particular group , race or religion .
( obsolete ) Knowledge formed in advance; foresight , presaging .
( chiefly obsolete ) Mischief ; hurt ; damage ; injury ; detriment .
